description: Great view point with fire lookout shack.
directions:
Coming from Langdale Ferry terminal reach Pender Harbour then go past 
Garden Bay road / Sunshine coast hwy intersection for 5.6k on the hwy.   
Then turn uphill into Malaspina St rd.  From here in 1k turn right into small 
road.  In 2.5k take left fork.  In 4.7k you will reach the trail head where 
washout point is(with parking spot for 5-6 cars )
title: Mt Hallowell
